### createPassConfig() {#acc017c4f2e016856d2cc517d232bdba0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TargetPassConfig &#42; R600TargetMachine::createPassConfig (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM)</>}

Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

createPassConfig - Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

Targets may override this to extend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>.

### getTargetTransformInfo() {#aff7b8c3dc4dd444d02fcba493124571c}

<MemberDefinition

Get a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> implementation for the target.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> returned uses the common code generator to answer queries about the IR.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-h">R600TargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-cpp/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-cpp">R600TargetMachine.cpp</a>.

### isMachineVerifierClean() {#a9cce62c939c90e06f68b9fcd4e6f804b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::R600TargetMachine::isMachineVerifierClean () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns true if the target is expected to pass all machine verifier checks.

This is a stopgap measure to fix targets one by one. We will remove this at some point and always enable the verifier when EXPENSIVE&#95;CHECKS is enabled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600targetmachine-h">R600TargetMachine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
